snippet: SHARENOW--Sheldon, of Great Neck, NY. Age 96, passed away on April 16, 2016 at home. Sheldon was a devoted husband to Helene, and his late wife, Leila. Loving father of Shawn and Peter, Randy and Marc, Sue and Rob, Helene and Steven. Loving grandfather of Joline and David, Justin and Lindsey, Lyle and Johanna, Darin, and Jesse. Adoring great- grandfather of Isabelle, Georgia, Jack, Charlie, Sydney, Ruby, Oliver, William. Private service. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SHARENOW--Sheldon, of Great Neck, NY. Age 96, passed away on April 16, 2016 at home. Sheldon was a devoted husband to Helene, and his late wife, Leila. Loving father of Shawn and Peter, Randy and Marc, Sue and Rob, Helene and Steven. Loving grandfather of Joline and David, Justin and Lindsey, Lyle and Johanna, Darin, and Jesse. Adoring great- grandfather of Isabelle, Georgia, Jack, Charlie, Sydney, Ruby, Oliver, William. Private service. 1/3
